( SELECT u.id AS userId, u.nickname, u.image_path AS imagePath, 'HOST' AS role FROM trip_article t JOIN users u ON t.host_user_id = u.id WHERE t.id = #{id} )
UNION ALL
( SELECT u.id AS userId, u.nickname, u.image_path AS imagePath, cp.role FROM chat_participants cp JOIN users u ON cp.user_id = u.id JOIN chat_room cr ON cp.chat_room_id = cr.id WHERE cr.trip_article_id = #{id} AND cp.role = 'PARTICIPANT' -- 역할이 PARTICIPANT인 경우만 선택 )
ORDER BY role DESC
